CIPHER.0.cipherString: Spiritual identity means we are not what we do or what people say about us. And we are not what we have. We are the beloved daughters and sons of God.
CIPHER.0.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: Language... has created the word 'loneliness' to express the pain of being alone. And it has created the word 'solitude' to express the glory of being alone.
CIPHER.1.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. The letters M and G map to D and N.

CIPHER.2.cipherString: Til 1983, I wrote primarily for other psychologists and expected that they would be the principal audience for my book.
CIPHER.2.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. The letters L and V map to A and U.

CIPHER.3.cipherString: I believe that writing is derivative. I think good writing comes from good reading.
CIPHER.3.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. The letters N and A map to H and U.

CIPHER.4.cipherString: Choosing is a creative process, one through which we construct our environment, our lives, ourselves.
CIPHER.4.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. The letters H and W map to J and Q.

CIPHER.5.cipherString: Any time I have to get on a plane and leave my kids for a few days, it's kind of tortuous.
CIPHER.5.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. The letters C and K map to B and Z.
